entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 26 February 2023
